title: Balayage
description: A highlighting technique used to create a gradient blend from the natural hair to the desired colour.

title: Peek A Boo Highlights
description: Colour is only applied at the bottom layer revealing a pop of colour while keeping the top layer natural.

title: Toner Refresh
description: Freshen up your colour with the perfect tone for longer lasting results. Service includes all over toner, root melt (optional), wash, and style!
